doc.text: Registers additional objects. These objects will be registered with the id and registry of  this object and optionally a name suffix.

doc.summary: Adds fields with additional registry values to the <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/registration/tracking/RegistryTracker">RegistryTracker</ref>.
doc.text: Adds fields with additional registry values to the <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/registration/tracking/RegistryTracker">RegistryTracker</ref>. This called, unless  <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/registration/RegistrationBuilder" method="disableRegistryTracking" type="()void">RegistrationBuilder#disableRegistryTracking()</ref> ()} is set.

doc.summary: Base interface for classes that act as a container for other objects.
doc.text:
Base interface for classes that act as a container for other objects. A MultiRegisterable can't be directly registered into a registry, however the registry specified with it is used as
default in #registerAdditional(RegistrationContext, EntryCollector).

properties.text: To register multiple elements at the same time, use a regular <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/registration/Registerable">Registerable</ref>  add register the additional elements in <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/registration/Registerable" method="registerAdditional" type="(org.moddingx.libx.registration.RegistrationContext,org.moddingx.libx.registration.Registerable.EntryCollector)void">Registerable#registerAdditional(RegistrationContext, Registerable.EntryCollector)</ref>.  For the use in ModInit, use <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/annotation/registration/PlainRegisterable">PlainRegisterable</ref>. This way, it's possible to for example put <ref cls="net/minecraft/world/item/Item">Item</ref>s and  containers registering 16 items, one for each color in the same class annotated ith <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/annotation/registration/RegisterClass">RegisterClass</ref>.
